title: 2 Blocks to East Passyunk Ave - 2 Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms, Large Deck.
description:
Feast your eyes on this beautiful, 3-story, brick front home in the foodie neighborhood of Passyunk Square! 2 bedrooms and 2 full baths! Welcoming you inside are the 20ft ceilings and open first floor layout with a unique design! The modern, renovated kitchen features gorgeous cherry wood cabinets, recessed lighting, and stainless-steel appliances. Back door access leads to patio area perfect for your grill just off the kitchen!
There is a large unfinished basement housing the homes washer & dryer, mechanicals, and great storage space. Venture up the spiral staircase to the 2nd floor loft/bedroom overlooking the first floor, that is currently being used as a game room and also one of the full bathrooms. (The owners are willing to either leave or take the pool table).
The 2nd floor staircase leads to an open, 3rd floor bedroom with a newly renovated full bathroom and access to a roof deck with stellar center city views! Perfect for enjoying a summer date night under the stars!
Did we mention location? This home is truly near everything South Philly has to offer! The famous Pat and Geno's Steaks, Termini Bakery, all the great restaurants and bars of East Passyunk Ave., and the Italian Market, just to name a few! Also, there is the amazing dog park, Gold Star park only a ½ a block down Wharton for your furry friend and a convenience store on the corner!
Listing courtesy of Keller Williams Main Street

title: Graduate Hospital 2 Bedroom House For Rent
description:
This large, extra wide beautifully renovated townhome has 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms.
The main floor consists of the living room, powder room, dining area and kitchen and has an open layout with beautiful hardwood flooring and abundant recessed lighting.
The kitchen has granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, tons of cabinet space and a mosaic tile backsplash. Off the kitchen is the expansive deck/patio great for entertaining.
The spacious master bedroom has double wide closets and recessed lighting. The rear bedroom has good closet space and a charming bay window. The hall bathroom has dual vanity sinks, granite countertops, a stunning custom shower and a linen closet.

title: Spacious four bedroom home for rent
description: Property features four large bedrooms, 2 full baths, a large Living room, dining room and kitchen. Property also features a finished basement with a inlaw suite. The inlaw suite has a full bathroom, a kitchenette, walk in closet, bedroom and living room. Perfect for a family of 5 or more. Why rent when you can own? On the third floor there is a convenient washer & dryer prior to entering the light-filled master suite. The master bedroom is large and spacious with two reach-in closets and an en-suite bathroom. This home is in the heart of Fishtown and is a Walker's Paradise with a Walkscore of 91.
